<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Calculate purity field is introduced in quebec. For clustering solution pre quebec cal_purity will be set to true if solution definition has purity fields selected otherwise set to false.</description>
        <name>Quebec-Cal Purity field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("ml_capability_definition_clustering");
gr.initialize();
if (gr.isValidField('cal_purity')) {
	var clustering_def = new GlideRecord("ml_capability_definition_clustering");
	clustering_def.query();
	while (clustering_def.next()) {
		if (clustering_def.getValue('cal_purity') == null)  {
			if (clustering_def.getValue('purity_fields') == null){
				clustering_def.setValue('cal_purity',0);
			} else {
				clustering_def.setValue('cal_purity',1);
			}
			clustering_def.update();
		}
	}	
}
]]></script>
